text: Grieve amendment may refer to a number of amendments tabled by Dominic Grieve, mostly associated with parliamentary votes on Brexit, including: * Amendments to the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018: **Alteration of Clause 9 (Amendment 7), designed so parliament would have a final say on any UK-EU deal; ** Alternative amendment by Grieve, designed to force the prime minister to report to parliament in the event of a no-deal Brexit and gain parliamentary approval for any future plans; ** Government compromise amendment, requires the prime minister to report to parliament but does not require any parliamentary approval for future plans; * Amendment to the Northern Ireland (Executive Formation etc) Act 2019, designed to prevent the prorogation of parliament in the run up to the 31 October Brexit deadline.
title: Grieve amendment
